questionTitle: Which of the following is a method for bidding on unused EC2 capacity based on the current spot price?
questionExplanation: This feature offers a significantly lower price, but it varies over time or may not be available when there is no excess capacity.

questionOption1: The standard instances are not suitable for standard server applications
questionOption2: High memory instances are useful for large data throughput applications such as SQL Server databases and data caching and retrieval
questionOption3: FPS is exposed as an API that sorts transactions into packages called Quick Starts that makes it easy to implement
questionExplanation: The standard instances are deemed to be suitable for standard server applications.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance has an hourly rate with no long-term commitment?
questionExplanation: Pricing varies by zone, instance, and pricing model.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a batch processing application?
questionExplanation: Condor is a powerful, distributed batch-processing system that lets you use otherwise idle CPU cycles in a cluster of workstations.

questionOption1: Security can be set through passwords, Kerberos tickets, or certificates
questionOption2: Secure access to your EC2 AMIs is controlled by passwords, Kerberos, and 509 Certificates
questionOption3: Most of the system image templates that Amazon AWS offers are based on Red Hat Linux
questionExplanation: Hundreds of free and paid AMIs can be found on AWS.

questionTitle: How many EC2 service zones or regions exist?
questionExplanation: There are four different EC2 service zones or regions.

questionTitle: Amazon ______ cloud-based storage system allows you to store data objects ranging in size from 1 byte up to 5GB.
questionExplanation: In S3, storage containers are referred to as buckets.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be done with S3 buckets through the SOAP and REST APIs?
questionOption1: Upload new objects to a bucket and download them
questionOption2: Create, edit, or delete existing buckets
questionOption3: Specify where a bucket should be stored
questionExplanation: The REST API is preferred to the SOAP API because it is easier to work with large binary objects with REST.

questionTitle: Which of the following operation retrieves the newest version of the object?
questionExplanation: Versioning also can be used for preserving data and for archiving purposes.

questionTitle: Which of the following statement is wrong about Amazon S3?
questionOption2: Amazon S3 provides large quantities of reliable storage that is highly protected
questionExplanation: S3 excels in applications where storage is archival in nature.
